Placemark.description:
State = West Virginia
County = Brooke
Only the Town of Bethany is dry.

State = West Virginia
County = Wetzel
Entire county is dry, except the City of New Martinsville and the Town of Hundred

State = West Virginia
County = Marion
Only the Town of Worthington is dry

State = West Virginia
County = Hampshire
Only the Town of Capon Bridge is dry

State = West Virginia
County = Grant
Petersburg is wet.

State = West Virginia
County = Upshur
Entire county is dry, except the City of Buckhannon

State = West Virginia
County = Jackson
Entire county is dry, except the Cities of Ripley and Ravenswood

State = West Virginia
County = Roane
Entire county is dry, except the City of Spencer

State = West Virginia
County = Pocahontas
Entire county is dry, except the Town of Durbin and the City of Marlinton

State = West Virginia
County = Kanawha
Only the Town of East Bank is dry

State = West Virginia
County = Wayne
Only the Towns of Wayne and Fort Gay are dry

State = West Virginia
County = Lincoln
Entire county is dry, except the Town of Hamlin
